name: Days of Wind
flavor: "Awoken grieve for Kell-Queen. I grieve too… but grieve with open eyes. Do you know what I see?" —Variks

name: EV-30 Tumbler
flavor: It takes a skilled field mechanic to disable limiters without destabilizing the entire drive.

name: EV-31 Nightbird
flavor: Drive fast and take risks.

name: EV-32 Snowblind
flavor: In modifying field drives, the limiting factor is tolerance to the possibility of explosive disassembly.

name: EV-33 Dragonrider
flavor: At some point, it will come down to how tightly you can hold on.

name: EV-34 Vector Infinite
flavor: Reserved for mentor Guardians who initiate others into the mysteries of the Light.

name: EV-35 Arcrunner
flavor: Those who seek to bind the lightning may find themselves consumed by it instead.

name: EV-36 Solscout
flavor: The power of the sun harnessed for use by the bravest of warriors.

name: EV-37 Voidstreak
flavor: Fueled by the Void.

name: EV-38 Laurelbearer
flavor: There are many who seek victory. Few will wear the laurel.

name: EV-39 Lumos
flavor: The rose turns toward the sun, but its roots grow deep in Darkness.

name: EV-40 Snowscream
flavor: The fool may not fear the storm, but the storm will never respect a fool.

name: EV-41 Momentum Master
flavor: To the victor goes the prize.

name: EV-42 Nightsteed
flavor: Every hero requires a trusty mount.

name: EV-43 Lightrunner
flavor: Night falls, but your eyes are turned toward the dawn.

name: S-10
flavor: Quick on the ground and small enough for transmat deployment.

name: S-10v
flavor: The Vanguard prizes its Sparrows, which are invaluable for recon and quick deployment.

name: S-11
flavor: A tuned-up vector drive gives this Sparrow a bit more spring in its step.

name: S-13 "Graverobber"
flavor: There are many who seek to cheat death, but so few capable of outrunning its dark embrace.

name: S-20 Cavalier
flavor: The Series-20 Cavalier is a Titan mainstay, more robust and reliable than the baseline Sparrow.

name: S-20 Nomad
flavor: Hunters have a reputation for technical savvy. The S-20 Nomad highlights that expertise.

name: S-20 Seeker
flavor: Warlocks devised the Series-20 Seeker variant of the Sparrow for their own arcane purposes.

name: S-21 Cavalier
flavor: Titans tune their thrust bikes to handle the burden of heavy armor.

name: S-21 Nomad
flavor: On foot or by thrust bike, Hunters carve new trails through the frontier.

name: S-21 Seeker
flavor: Careful attention to the Seeker's shielding reduces field interference.

name: S-22 Cavalier
flavor: The Series-22 Cavalier helps put Titans right where they belong--in the thick of the battle.

name: S-22 Nomad
flavor: The Series-22 Nomad helps Hunters stalk swift prey.

name: S-22 Seeker
flavor: The Series-22 Seeker answers the esoteric needs of elite Warlocks.

name: S-30C (Emerald)
flavor: This S-30C's strange drive leaves an unusual green trail.

name: S-30C (Plasma)
flavor: This S-30C's custom plasma drive presents a compelling argument for speed over safety.

name: S-30C (Stealth)
flavor: This S-30C's stealth drive filters out most high frequency emissions.

name: S-30C (Void)
flavor: This S-30C's prototype drive is tinted purple by exotic void reactions.

name: S-30C Phoenix
flavor: The coveted S-30C Phoenix is reserved for Guardians who demonstrate exceptional resolve.

name: S-30V
flavor: The Vanguard reserves the Series-30 Sparrow for the most successful Guardians.

name: S-30V (Emerald)
flavor: This S-30V's strange drive leaves an unusual green trail.

name: S-30V (Plasma)
flavor: This S-30V's custom plasma drive presents a compelling argument for speed over safety.

name: S-30V (Stealth)
flavor: This S-30V's stealth drive filters out most high frequency emissions.

name: S-30V (Void)
flavor: This S-30V's prototype drive is tinted purple by exotic void reactions.

name: S-31C (Emerald)
flavor: This S-31C's strange drive leaves an unusual green trail.

name: S-31C (Plasma)
flavor: This S-31C's custom plasma drive presents a compelling argument for speed over safety.

name: S-31C (Stealth)
flavor: This S-31C's stealth drive filters out most high frequency emissions.

name: S-31C (Void)
flavor: This S-31C's prototype drive is tinted purple by exotic void reactions.

name: S-31C Phoenix
flavor: This variant of the coveted Phoenix has an improved powerplant.

name: S-31V
flavor: The Series-31V sports an improved powerplant.

name: S-31V (Emerald)
flavor: This S-31V's strange drive leaves an unusual green trail.

name: S-31V (Plasma)
flavor: This S-31V's custom plasma drive presents a compelling argument for speed over safety.

name: S-31V (Stealth)
flavor: This S-31V's stealth drive filters out most high frequency emissions.

name: S-31V (Void)
flavor: This S-31V's prototype drive is tinted purple by exotic void reactions.

name: S-32C (Emerald)
flavor: This S-32C's strange drive leaves an unusual green trail.

name: S-32C (Plasma)
flavor: This S-32C's custom plasma drive presents a compelling argument for speed over safety.

name: S-32C (Stealth)
flavor: This S-32C's stealth drive filters out most high frequency emissions.

name: S-32C (Void)
flavor: This S-32C's prototype drive is tinted purple by exotic void reactions.

name: S-32C Phoenix
flavor: This variant of the coveted Phoenix has a powerful drive and agile thrusters.

name: S-32V
flavor: The Series-32V offers superb power and sterling maneuverability.

name: S-32V (Emerald)
flavor: This S-32V's strange drive leaves an unusual green trail.

name: S-32V (Plasma)
flavor: This S-32V's custom plasma drive presents a compelling argument for speed over safety.

name: S-32V (Stealth)
flavor: This S-32V's stealth drive filters out most high frequency emissions.

name: S-32V (Void)
flavor: This S-32V's prototype drive is tinted purple by exotic void reactions.

name: S-34 Ravensteel
flavor: The Sparrow is your pen, speed your ink, the open road your blank page. You are a poet of motion.

name: S-35 Aeon Glow
flavor: Turn on the lights.

name: SR-0 Swiftriver
flavor: Don't fight it. Flow with it.

name: SR-1 Swiftriver
flavor: Upgraded field engine makes the Swiftriver more nimble than ever.

name: SV7 "War Runner"
flavor: A high-end Sparrow earned by those Guardians who prove their worth in the Trials of Osiris.

name: Velumbra
flavor: "I face the challenges to come with dry eyes. There will be a time to mourn, but not until we have our vengeance." —Petra Venj

name: XV0 "Timebreaker"
flavor: Many are brave, but only the strong and the living will ever ride this Sparrow.

name: Arecibo Answer
flavor: "It's time to go. It's time to be our own answer." —Arach Jalaal

name: Eternally Assured Destruction
flavor: "Technically, it's not a loss; it's a draw." —Lakshmi-2

name: Flamecourser
flavor: Fire in your eyes, ash in your wake.

name: Gjallarwing
flavor: Destruction in motion.

name: S-38 Regal Bearing
flavor: "A monarch cannot simply be powerful. A monarch must also look powerful." —Executor Hideo

name: S-39 Autumn Glow
flavor: The nights are colder now. We must bring the Light.

name: S-39 Lightrider
flavor: "Using a Sparrow in the Crucible… It's a bold move. I like bold moves." —Lord Shaxx

name: S-40 Iron Revelry
flavor: "Our weapons were keen, our Sparrows nimble, our laughter loud and bold." —Lord Saladin

name: S-35 Jealousy
flavor: It's what they feel when they see you.

name: XV1 Usurper
flavor: Long ride the king!

name: XV2 Replicator
flavor: The Sparrow, perfected.
